mapper.insert:
insert into room_source_info (id, supplier_id, supplier_hotel_id, supplier_room_type_id, supplier_room_id, hotel_id, room_type_id, room_id, out_booking_code, out_rate_plan_id, source_type, sub_source_type, creator_id, create_time, modified_id, modified_time, is_visible, is_deleted) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.supplierHotelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.supplierRoomTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.supplierRoomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.hotelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.roomTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.roomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.outBookingCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.outRatePlanId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sourceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.subSourceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.modifiedId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.isVisible,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.delete: update room_source_info set is_deleted = 1 where room_id = #{roomId}
